subject: [Radiance-general] Installation problems
body:
Hi Lucio,

If the machine is not yours to do with as you please, I would suggest
contacting your system administrator.

Under ubuntu you can use the package manager. You can search for libc6
and libc6-dev to see if they are installed. Alternatively you could just
download compiled binaries and see if they work.

Alternatively, you can check for compiled binaries at

www.radiance-online.org

additionally it looks like there is a radiance package available for the
latest Ubuntu (I assume via the recent efforts to include radiance in
Debian by Bernd Zeimetz) at:

http://packages.ubuntu.com/hardy/graphics/radiance

-Jack

loscotec@libero.it wrote:
